compatibility.title: eSIM Compatibility Checker
compatibility.subtitle: Check if your device is compatible with eSIM technology before purchasing your plan
compatibility.home_subtitle: Check if your device is compatible before purchasing the service
compatibility.disclaimer: * Check if your device is compatible with eSIM technology.
compatibility.compatible_message: Your device is compatible with eSIM. You can proceed with the purchase.
compatibility.not_compatible_message: This device is not compatible with eSIM technology.
compatibility.device_not_found: We couldn't find information about this device. Contact support for more help.
compatibility.unlock_reminder_message: Your device must be unlocked (carrier-free) to use eSIM. If your device is carrier-locked, contact your current provider to unlock it before using our services.
compatibility.info_1: Compatibility may vary by region and carrier
compatibility.info_3: If you have questions, contact our support team

why_choose.title: Why choose
why_choose.no_physical_sim_desc: Keep your physical SIM card maintaining voice and SMS services and add an eSIM from anywhere easily and quickly
why_choose.global_coverage_desc: Data plans in more than 200 countries connecting you with the most important local operators.
why_choose.instant_delivery_desc: You will receive your eSIM immediately upon completing the purchase of your chosen plan
why_choose.save_roaming_desc: Pay local prices for mobile internet services
why_choose.easy_setup_desc: Quick and simple installation in just a few clicks using a QR code
why_choose.total_satisfaction_desc: We want you to love our service—from sign-up to your trip. That’s why we provide boutique support and personal care.

benefits.title: Your
benefits.subtitle: Don't waste time or extra money, SimConnect is the solution.

install.title: INSTALL
install.description: You'll receive a QR code via email or WhatsApp, scan it to install the eSIM on your device

connect.title: CONNECT & ACTIVATE
connect.description: Upon arrival at your destination, the eSIM will connect to the internet and activate the service

enjoy.title: ENJOY
enjoy.description: The best signal and speed of the country you visit, enjoying the best customer service

what_includes.feature4: WiFi Hotspot to share internet with your companions

testimonials.subtitle: What do our clients think about SimConnect service?

testimonial1.quote: SimConnect has been very useful on my trips to Argentina and Chile, mobile data has been fast and stable. Highly recommended!
testimonial1.name: María González

testimonial2.quote: Excellent connectivity and data speed in Spain with SimConnect. Great decision!
testimonial2.name: Carlos Becerril

testimonial3.quote: SimConnect keeps us connected in Colombia. Reliable service and efficient support.
testimonial3.name: Laura Martínez

testimonial4.quote: Perfect for business trips. Instant activation and global coverage are exceptional.
testimonial4.name: Roberta Silva

testimonial5.quote: Impeccable service in Europe. Local prices and ease of use exceeded my expectations.
testimonial5.name: Ana Rodríguez
